attributes.action: protest to stop mass immigrarion on new years day 2013
attributes.additional_details: all british citzens must stop mass immigration on new years eve 2013 from romanian and bulgaria.if we all sit back and do nothing to stop this. all our kids will suffer no jobs no homes no future.all our grandparents fort for this country.now its our turn to stop  mass immigration on new years eve 2013 i call for a protest out side the house of commons on 11 september at 12 o clock.the clock is ticking so lets all sign and be there. ask not what your country can do for you but what we all have to do to save our country
